Ingredients.1: 0.5 cups self-rising flour, plus more for kneading

Ingredients.4: 2 teaspoons everything bagel seasoning, or to taste

Directions.1: Mix flour and Greek yogurt together in a medium bowl until a shaggy dough forms. Transfer to a surface dusted with self-rising flour, and knead for 8 to 10 minutes. Continue adding flour as needed if the dough is too sticky.

Directions.2: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.3: Cut the dough into 4 pieces, roughly 4 ounces each. Roll each segment into a smooth ball. Use your thumbs to poke a hole in the center of each round, then gently stretch the dough until it becomes a uniform-sized ring.

Directions.4: Transfer the dough to a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.

Directions.5: Whisk the egg in a small bowl to create an egg wash, then brush a light coating on top of the dough. Sprinkle with bagel seasoning.

Directions.6: Bake in the preheated oven for 20 to 22 minutes. Increase the oven's temperature to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C) and continue to bake until golden, 3 to 4 minutes more.
